junit.swingui

Class TestHierarchyRunView

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.swingui.TestHierarchyRunView

  • public class TestHierarchyRunView
extends java.lang.Object
    A hierarchical view of a test run. The contents of a test suite is shown as a tree.
